# ErrorResponse.Errors

**Object**

The details about an error that are returned when an API request isn’t successful.

## Declaration

```swift
object ErrorResponse.Errors
```

## Discussion

Use the `code` parameter for programmatic error handling. See [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/parsing-the-error-response-code] for more information. For more information about using the `source` parameter, see [doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/pinpointing-the-location-of-errors].

## Objects

- **JsonPointer**: An object that contains the JSON pointer that indicates the location of the error.
- **Parameter**: An object that contains the query parameter that produced the error.
- **ErrorResponse.Errors.Meta**: An object that contains the error itself or associated errors.
